targets.query:
from(bucket: "modbus2")
  |> range(start: -1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "predict")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sensor1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag1"] == "value1")
  |> last() 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _field: "1번 센서",
    _time: r._time, 
    _value: r._value
  }))

from(bucket: "modbus2")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "predict")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sensor2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag1"] == "value1")
  |> last()
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _field: "2번 센서",
    _time: r._time, 
    _value: r._value
  }))
